name: Parque Santiago IV

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Excellent location, rooms cleaned every day. Staff could not do enough for us. The waiters at the pool joined in with some friendly banter and for a nice hotel in its location was not expensive for food or drinks. I was in Tenerife for the first time with my friends, but would definitely take my wife next time. One of the best boys holidays I've had.
reviews.title: Parque Santiago 4

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012
reviews.text: Excelent location apartments spotless reception area and staff very helpful always happy to help bar area at pool good prices for hotels in area pool imaculate excelent views from balcony recommended only downside and wasnt too big a deal no aircon fans available to hire fresh fruit and water and bottle wine on arrival nice touch will return
reviews.title: Great relaxing holiday just what i needed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed here last 2 weeks in september with my wife and Daughter, Previously stayed at santiago 3 years ago and was hoping to go back there, so on arival we were a bit dissapionted to be told we were staying at 4 and had a street view facing 3.
reviews.title: Almost 5/5

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012
reviews.text: This turned out to be fortunate though as 4 is in my opinion better and the street view meant that by 4 oclock the sun was behind our balcony and you could sit out and chill with a beer and read a book in comfort before going out for the night. No trouble sleeping either.
reviews.title: Great stay at Parque Santiago

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Swimming pool marvellous even though it needs touching up, Pool Bar too expensive they would sell more if they droped the price a bit, Maids are fantastic, If it was too early for you they would come back later. Apartments are spotless and everything you need, I get the point about Air con but you cant have everything and I personally think some of the other country's travel agents may get the pick of the apartments, They may charge customers more.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: the rooms are great but dont rely on the sofa bed for two people they would only be suitable for two small children . The pool area is big and plenty of sun beds but its right on the beach if you prefer that. However the beach further up is not as rocky and easier to get in and out of the sea. The eating areas are cheap enough and serve decent food, the cafe on the beach front does lovely coffees.
reviews.title: girlie holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the resort is perfect for all amieneties, with shops , restaruants and bars all in walking distance.
reviews.title: Excellent, private apartment.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the parque santiago IV in a studio booked through Jean Bolton. The apartment was number 1003.
reviews.title: Great hotel & great place altogether

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: POOL
reviews.title: Pre-winter break!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I really enjoyed the hotel, there was ample sunbeds around the pool (september) with parasols also available at no extra cost. Although the pool was a bit chilly it was fine once you got in. The poolside was very clean and had a security presence throughout the day. You are also able to use the pool at the parque santiago III which is a bit bigger, and there is also a jacuzzi (although beware this is not heated and just has the jets). The tiles when you get out of the pool are REALLY hot so remember to bring a pair of flip flops that you don't mind getting wet. There is a poolside bar which serves drinks, snacks and icecreams, but this seemed expensive for the area however we did make use of the free table tennis and €1 air hockey.
reviews.title: it was a hot one

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a weeks stay at Parque Santiago IV (19th Oct 12) We stayed in the high rise part of IV on the 6th floor - fantastic views, lovely room, and everything you need is seconds away. Playa has everything you need for a relaxing holiday and every night we ate out at different restaurants, all very good and reasonable. We are planning our 4th return to Playa next year, it really has everything but has the extra sun all year round.
reviews.title: Great Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My fiancé and I, along with my brother and his fiancé visited Tenerife in October 2012 for 7 nights. All 4 of us stayed in Parque Santaigo IV and were delighted with the accommodation. Our apartments’ were located on the ground floor and each one had a small private terraced garden only steps away from the pool.
reviews.title: Perfect Parque Santiago 4

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: LOCATION
reviews.title: October 2012

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartments are ideally located with easy access to main hustle of Las Americas and Los Christianos. Even taking this into account the complex is very quiet and relaxing. It is also close to the new shopping area with excellent restaurants and bars in the Safari Centre. We tried a few restaurants here (Bianco and Bombay Blue Indian to name but a few) and the food was excellent. There are several restaurants nearby, but we do recommend the Golden House Chinese just behind the safari centre.
reviews.title: Great position

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ROOMS
reviews.title: Good Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Went for a week in Nov 2012. Stayed in room 1328 on the 3rd floor. We had 3 balconies! Clean and comfortable throughout. Towels were changed every other day. Pool area lovely & clean, plenty of sunbeds free. Bar staff very helpful & friendly by the pool area. There is an open plan bar just outsidethe hotel * I think this is owned by the hotel. The bar staff in there are rude & unhelpful. We waited 10 mins to place a drinks order even though there was hardly any other guest, then after a further 10 mins our drinks hadn't appeared so we walked off. My other criticism is a lack of air con. Whilst it was bearable at around 24 degrees I'd hate to stay there in warmer weather. There were ceiling fans but they were useless. Otherwise everything was great.
reviews.title: Perfect for a winter break.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012
reviews.text: First time in Tenerife we stayed at the resort for 8 days. Room was spacious and clean. We had a ground floor room so no ocean view but a nice terrace instead. Virtually everything is nearby, from supermarket to restaurants. We did a lot of trips by car and the resort is easy to get to and from. (Parking space for rental car right in front of the hotel too, though I think if it weren't November it would probably be challenging to find a spot to park).
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Swimming pools were nice. One was heated which is a good thing this time of year. Weather was great too late November. Only rain we saw was on the day we left.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable and very kind people

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great place to stay in Playa de Las Americas! Clean, spacious rooms with good beds. Fine balcony (we had two balconies, 2 bedroom appartment) en beautiful ocean/mountain view when staying in the main tower. Very friendly staff, always a smile and greeting.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Two swimmingpools with more than enough beds (hotel was fully booked, never a problem getting one)
reviews.title: Awesome holiday

aka: Parque Santiago Iv Hotel Playa De Las Americas
